getFactory

public HibGraphFactory getFactory()
Description copied from interface: Engine
Returns an appropriate GraphFactory for this Engine. Subclasses may override this provide customer behavior.

Returns:
A GraphFactory which will generate the appropriate types for this Engine.

fireEvent

public void fireEvent(ExecutionEvent event)
Description copied from interface: Engine
This will send the given event to listeners who have registered for events on all processes and to listeners who have registered for events on the process that originated this event.

Parameters:
event - The event to send to all interested listeners.

addExecutionListener

public void addExecutionListener(ExecutionListener listener,
                                 ExecutionEventType... eventTypes)
Description copied from interface: Engine
Adds a listener for the given event types for all processes. It is not added to each process individually, but rather added to a global set of listeners. Global generally means global for instances of a particular engine types.
ExecutionListener instances may be be reused and they may be serialized in some fashion. Therefore, they must be thread safe and they must have a default constructor.

Parameters:
listener - The listener
eventTypes - The event types to be notified for.

addExecutionListener

public void addExecutionListener(Process process,
                                 ExecutionListener listener,
                                 ExecutionEventType... eventTypes)
Description copied from interface: Engine
Adds a listener for the given event types for the given process.
ExecutionListener instances may be be reused and they may be serialized in some fashion. Therefore, they must be thread safe and they must have a default constructor.

Parameters:
process - The process to add the listener for, or null for all processes
listener - The listener
eventTypes - The event types to be notified for.

removeExecutionListener

public void removeExecutionListener(ExecutionListener listener,
                                    ExecutionEventType... eventTypes)
Description copied from interface: Engine
Will remove the given listener from the set of global listeners.If no event types are specified, the listener will be removed for all event types. Otherwise it will be removed for only the specified event types.
The listener doesn't need to match exactly. All listeners of this type will be matched. What matches types is determined by the implementation, but usually it means same class.

Parameters:
listener - The type of listener to remove
eventTypes - The set of event types to remove the listener for, or none to remove for all

removeExecutionListener

public void removeExecutionListener(Process process,
                                    ExecutionListener listener,
                                    ExecutionEventType... eventTypes)
Description copied from interface: Engine
Will remove the listener from the given proces. If no event types are specified, the listener will be removed for all event types. Otherwise it will be removed for only the specified event types.
The listener doesn't need to match exactly. All listeners of this type will be matched. What matches types is determined by the implementation, but usually it means same class.

Parameters:
process - The process to remove the listener from, or null to remove from the global listener set
listener - The type of listener to remove
eventTypes - The set of event types to remove the listener for, or none to remove for all

getExecutionListenerInstance

public ExecutionListener getExecutionListenerInstance(String type)
                                               throws WorkflowException
Description copied from interface: Engine
Engine implementations can cache instances of ExecutionListener.

Parameters:
type - The type of the execution listener. Probably a class name, but different implementations of Engine may use a different scheme.
Returns:
The instance of ExecutionListener appropriate for this type
Throws:
WorkflowException - If an instance for the type cannot be found or created.

                                      boolean enableCaching)
